data.title: Philanthropist and art collector Iris Cantor, known for donating Rodin artworks, dies at age 95, leaving a legacy.
data.description: The wife and financier B. Gerald Cantor built up a significant private collection of Rodin pieces, one of the largest, and generously gifted a substantial portion to museums globally.
Silvano Fashion Group reports Q4 and full-year 2025 unaudited financial results. #SilvanoFashionGroup #FinancialReport
Trump: 360k barrels of Venezuelan oil sitting in tanker.

data.title: Banco Santander (Brasil) S.A. files Annual Report on Form 20-F, reporting financial and operational data.
data.description: Brazilian financial institution Banco Santander has recently disclosed its Annual Report on Form 20-F to the market. The report includes detailed financial and operational information. The documented report, referred to as the "20-F", was officially filed on February 27, 2026, in São Paulo. Santander Brasil's identification numbers, CNPJ/MF 90.400.888/0001-42 and NIRE 35.300.332.067, are associated with this filing.

data.title: Citrini Research predicts 10% US jobless rate by 2028 due to AI. Nvidia's strong earnings fail to calm investors. Dow Jones worst week of 2026.
data.description: Wall Street was shaken by a Citrini Research report predicting mass unemployment among white-collar workers due to AI agents replacing human labor at scale. The report forecasted a U.S. jobless rate over 10% by 2028 with weekly claims nearing half a million. Economists disagreed, citing the market's adaptability to tech disruption. Despite Nvidia's strong earnings, markets experienced fear, with the Dow Jones posting its worst week in 2026. Nvidia's stock dropped over 5% despite positive guidance, indicating a shift from euphoria to skepticism.(Block Inc. also had news confirming the trend.).

data.title: Monkee's of Hyde Park opens in Cincinnati at 3439 Edwards Road under owner Sue Reichert, offering a fashion-forward boutique experience.
data.description: In Cincinnati, a new boutique named Monkee's of Hyde Park has recently opened its doors at 3439 Edwards Road. Owned by Sue Reichert, the store aims to offer a trendy and stylish shopping experience to the Hyde Park community. Reichert, the owner, has long been a fan of Monkee's and is thrilled to introduce the brand to the local residents.

data.title: IQVIA releases its 2025 Sustainability Report, detailing progress across its People, Public, and Planet pillars.
data.description: IQVIA Holdings Inc. (NYSE: IQV), a prominent global provider of clinical research services and healthcare intelligence, recently released its 2025 Sustainability Report. The report showcases the company's advancements in its People, Public, and Planet initiatives, aligning with its goal of fostering innovation for a healthier world. The report can be accessed for download, signaling IQVIA's commitment to transparency and accountability in its operations.

data.title: Barclays is reportedly exploring a move into crypto payments and deposits, as per Bloomberg.
data.description: Barclays, a prominent publicly traded bank, is reportedly contemplating entry into the cryptocurrency realm by offering payment and deposit services. This potential move is detailed in a recent report from Bloomberg.

data.description: Redbreast Irish Whiskey has introduced the Moscatel Wine Cask Edition on 10-Feb-2026. The news was released through PR Newswire and includes revised information provided by the company. This new edition offers a unique blend of flavors and aromas, with only [exact number] bottles available for purchase. For more information on this limited edition release, please refer to the updated news release below.

data.title: "Blue Shield Promise 和 L.A. Care 推出 SheWorks 項目，協助黑人女性職業發展。"
data.description: Blue Shield Promise and L.A. Care have launched a new program called SheWorks to enhance economic mobility and promote career development. California Long Beach, February 27, 2026 - Blue Shield of California Promise Health Plan and L.A. Care Health Plan announced today their collaboration with the California Black Women's Collective Empowerment Institute to support their latest initiative, SheWorks. This program aims to assist in boosting economic mobility and facilitating career advancement.

data.title: John Hancock Premium Dividend Fund announced $0.0825 monthly distribution; managed by John Hancock Investment Management.
data.description: On February 27, 2026, a closed-end fund managed by John Hancock Investment Management LLC and subadvised by Manulife Investment Management (US) LLC, known as John Hancock Premium Dividend Fund (NYSE: PDT), revealed the origins of its monthly distribution of $0.0825 per share.

data.title: John Hancock Tax-Advantaged Dividend Income Fund (NYSE: HTD) discloses distribution sources in notice to shareholders.
data.description: On February 27, 2026, in Boston, the John Hancock Tax-Advantaged Dividend Income Fund (NYSE: HTD), a closed-end fund managed by John Hancock Investment Management LLC and subadvised by Manulife Investment Management (US) LLC, disclosed the origins of its monthly distributions.

data.title: Dow falls on inflation data; Nvidia partner CoreWeave plunges on earnings. Live coverage on Investor's Business Daily.
data.description: Today, the Dow Jones index experienced a decline in response to high inflation data. CoreWeave, a partner of Nvidia, also suffered a drop in stock prices following poor earnings. The market is closely following these developments as investors track the impact of rising inflation. The Dow's decrease comes amidst concerns over economic stability and the implications of the Nvidia-OpenAI deal. Investors and analysts are closely monitoring these movements as they navigate the current market environment.
Anthropic and the Pentagon are still negotiating, a deal is possible - Axios.

data.title: Blue Shield Promise和L.A. Care与加州黑人女性集体赋权研究所合作提供SheWorks项目，支持经济和专业成长。
data.description: Blue Shield of California Promise Health Plan and L.A. Care Health Plan have announced a new partnership with the California Black Women's Collective Empowerment Institute to support economic mobility and professional development through the SheWorks program. This initiative will aim to empower black women by providing opportunities for career growth and financial stability. The collaboration will take place in Long Beach, California, and is set to commence on February 27, 2026. This joint effort signifies a commitment to enhancing the professional prospects and economic well-being of individuals, with a primary focus on supporting the advancement of black women in the workforce.

data.title: XRP struggles below $2, advocates see potential in the token and XRP Ledger for global finance. Tokenization comparison made between Canton Network and XRP Ledger. Ripple advocates still optimistic.
data.description: XRP is currently trading below $2, but industry discussions indicate its potential significance in a digitalized global financial system. In a recent podcast, experts compared the capabilities of the Canton Network and the XRP Ledger. The Depository Trust & Clearing Corporation's use of Canton for tokenization was debated, with the conclusion that it doesn't directly impact XRP's functionality. Canton focuses on real-world asset tokenization and privacy within subnets, while the XRP Ledger stands out for its instant cross-border and cross-asset settlement features. The Ledger is considered a bridge asset system, suggesting its crucial role in the future financial landscape. Check out the full article on Benzinga.com for more insights.

data.title: Principal Real Estate Income Fund (NYSE: PGZ) paid $0.105 per share on Feb 27, 2026 to shareholders, as part of managed distribution plan.
data.description: In Denver, the Principal Real Estate Income Fund (NYSE: PGZ) disclosed the origin of a distribution on February 27, 2026, amounting to $0.1050 per share. This distribution was allocated to shareholders on record as of the end of business on February 12, 2026, following the Fund's managed distribution plan. The U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission mandated this press release under an exemptive order granted to the Fund. Shareholders were also notified of the distribution source through a notice as required.

data.title: UDR to participate in 2026 Citi Global Property CEO Conference with their CEO, Thomas Toomey, on March 3, 2026 at 11:40 am ET. Webcast available at given link.
data.description: UDR, Inc., a top multifamily real estate investment trust traded on NYSE as UDR, will have its Chairman, President, and CEO, Thomas W. Toomey, along with the executive team, hosting a roundtable at the 2026 Citi Global Property CEO Conference on March 3, 2026, at 11:40 a.m. Eastern Time. This event will be live-streamed as a webcast accessible at https://kvgo.com/citi/udr-march-2.

data.title: AMTD Digital Inc.'s full-year results show significant growth: Revenue up 565.7% to $136.1M, Net Income up 132.7% to $97.0M.
data.description: On February 27, 2026, AMTD Digital Inc., a subsidiary of AMTD IDEA and AMTD Group Inc., disclosed the submission of its annual report on Form 20-F to the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission for the fiscal year concluding on October 31, 2025. Significant findings detailed in the report include a remarkable 565.7% surge in Total Revenue, escalating from US$20.4 million to US$136.1 million. Additionally, Total Net Income displayed a notable increase of 132.7%, climbing from US$41.7 million to US$97.0 million during the same period. Further information is accessible on Benzinga.com.
